## Data setup

:::{.panel-tabset}

#### {{< fa server >}} PDC

Source the initialization script {{< var pg_pgip_dir >}}/init.sh

```bash
source {{< var pg_pgip_dir >}}/init.sh
```

and run the exercise setup command:

```{bash }
#| label: setup-exercise
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
pgip exercises setup {{< var exercises.variant_filtering.dir >}} -v
```

#### {{< fa laptop >}} Local

Create an exercise directory called `{{< var
exercises.variant_filtering.dir >}}` and `cd` to it:

```{bash }
#| label: create-exercises-directory-local
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
mkdir -p {{< var exercises.variant_filtering.dir >}}
cd {{< var exercises.variant_filtering.dir >}}
```

Retrieve the data `{{< var datasets.variant_filtering.url >}}` with
`rsync`:

```bash
rsync -av {{< var datasets.variant_filtering.url >}} .
```

or `wget`:

```bash
wget --recursive --accept='*.*' \
     --reject='*.gif','index*' \
     --no-parent --no-directories \
     --no-clobber \
     --directory-prefix=. \
     {{< var datasets.variant_filtering.url >}}
```
